Khonkolor::

"Bogi what?" said Khonkolor "I wonder where he comes, I never heard 
about him before"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> One of the soldiers turned back to Khonkolor.  "You will be 
fighting 
> Bongiovi, an opponent who comes from a far off world.  He's 
preparing and 
> will be here shortly." And with that the soldier went on his way.
